name: Responsive-images-js
tagline: Simple jQuery powered function to enable responsive images
body: Responsive Images JS ==================== Simple jQuery powered function to enable responsive images Tested with jQuery 2.x, however I don't see why it shouldn't work on earlier versions. Feel free to test and let me know. Usage ----- Couldn't be any easy to use * data-sizes: allows predefined sizes or actual css media queries. * data-srcset: comma separated urls that are to be used in the same order as data-sizes Demo ---- [demo] [demo]:demo.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
